wms_article.title: LG Electronics puts solutions on display at Clean Show

wms_article_body.body: South Korean tech giant LG Electronics Inc. showcased its innovative laundry solutions for global business-to-business (B2B) customers at Clean Show 2025, North Americaâ€™s largest laundry and textile care trade show. The exhibition kicked off in Orlando, the United States, on Saturday (local time) and will run for four days. LG Electronics attracted strong attention from visitors by unveiling customized products and services designed not only for professional laundry businesses but for hotels, hospitals, dormitories, and other industrial settings as well.
